comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: A Samuel J. Bailey was a witness in the case for dissolution of US Steel. See query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A05E5DC103AE633A... This case was likely the context for another picture in this batch, www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3491619442/in/s...
